sent.trans: and和moreover是联系句子成分的意义和结构的。

sent.orig: Moreover, we've kept the price close to the costs of.
sent.trans: production.再说，这已经把价格压到生产费用的边缘了。

sent.orig: Moreover, using bioperl modules, the scripts written with perl language enable analysis automatically.
sent.trans: 并通过使用perl语言结合bioperl模块编写的脚本程序使分析过程。

sent.orig: Moreover, Hizbullah enjoys widespread support in the south.
sent.trans: 更有甚者，真主党在南部受到广泛支持。

sent.orig: Moreover, the views about the relationship between natural conservation and public recreation are put forward.
sent.trans: 同时，对自然保护与公众游乐的关系也提出了作者的看法。
